'''Alan Gutierrez''' (born [[1958]]) is an American fantasy artist.<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.deviantart.com/alangutierrezart/journal/My-Bio-by-Jack-Williamson-435962704|articlename=Biography|author=Jack Williamson|website=DeviantArt|dated=2002}}</ref> In the 1990s, he was commissioned by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]] to create art for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]].
